name: Home-Style Green Bean Casserole
description: This classic, American casserole is a true, holiday hero! Bring comfort and nostalgia to your holiday dinners with this timeless side dish. Use an air fryer to conquer those crispy onions for the topping—they’re ready in 10 minutes and are healthier than store-bought ones.

ingredients.name: Home-Style Chicken Stew Seasoning or Wintry Mushroom Soup Seasoning or Alfredo Sauce Mix

preparation: Thinly slice onion. Toss with oil and 1 tbsp seasoning and corn starch. Air fry 10 min, or until crispy, shaking the basket halfway through.
Meanwhile, combine remaining seasoning with milk. Set aside.

Heat butter in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add green beans; stir-fry 7–8 min, until softened. Add seasoning mixture to pan. Reduce heat to medium. Stir until sauce thickens and beans are well coated, about 1–2 min.
tips: Instead of crispy onions, combine 1 tbsp 3 Onion Dip Mix with 1 pkg Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix or 1 cup gluten-free panko breadcrumbs; sprinkle over casserole. Bake in preheated 400° F oven until golden brown.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup mashed potatoes or a small dinner roll.

products.name: Home-Style Chicken Stew Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Cozy up this season with a creamy, rich, and comforting chicken stew perfect for busy weeknights, cozy nights in, or to feed a crowd.

products.name: Wintry Mushroom Soup Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Where are all our mushroom lovers? This one's for you! A creamy, comforting classic with just a touch of heat, Wintry Mushroom Soup is easily made with three simple ingredients: Milk, butter, and mushrooms. A winter warmer you'll enjoy over and over again!

products.name: Alfredo Sauce Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Luxurious, creamy sauce for pasta, seafood, fish, and chicken.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!
